definition: festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
namely/that is/i.e./prompt/at once/at present/even if/prompted (by the occasion)/to approach/to come into contact/to assume (office)/to draw near
(zoology) segment (of the body of a worm, centipede etc)/(fig.) a part of an integrated whole: aspect (of a project), element (of a policy), sector (of the economy), stage (of a process), etc
to adjust/to regulate/to harmonize/to reconcile (accountancy etc)
saving/to save/to use sparingly/to cut down on

sentences.english: In the article 50 Totally Free Lessons in Graphic Design Theory the TutsPlus family definitely delivers with a bevy of knowledge building lessons in theory
sentences.chinese: 50節圖形設計免費課程將教授你大量的理論知識。

sentences.english: People visit the Shwedagon Pagoda during the yellow robe weaving festival in Yangon, Burma (Myanmar).
sentences.chinese: 在緬甸傳統的直桑岱點燈節，人們參觀仰光大金塔。

sentences.english: Galanz just about a week ago and the National US-held section of microwave ovens .
sentences.chinese: 格蘭仕大約一週前剛剛與國美合作舉行微波爐節。

sentences.english: Usually, this comparison is performed on a byte-by-byte basis.
sentences.chinese: 通常，這種比較是逐字節進行的。

sentences.english: Turn to Isaiah 26:3 and believe it today.
sentences.chinese: 翻閱以賽亞書二十六章3節，並立志信靠它。

sentences.english: Have a good rest, you need to save your energy for the tennis match this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 好好休息，你要爲下午的網球賽節省點精力。

sentences.english: Young Balinese girls compete during an international yoga festival in Denpasar.
sentences.chinese: 巴厘島的年輕女孩們正在登帕薩舉行國際瑜伽節比賽。
在提摩太後書1章7節那裏，保羅這樣稱呼它。

sentences.english: After consulting the LIB , the MPLS node forwards the packet toward its destination.
sentences.chinese: 之後，MPLS節點將包轉發給它的目的地。

sentences.english: Today is the Dragon-Head-Raising Festival in Northern China.
sentences.chinese: 今天是中國北方的龍擡頭節。

sentences.english: The [default] stanzas contains the password rules that are applied to the whole realm.
sentences.chinese: 節包含應用於整個領域的密碼規則。

sentences.english: Wish you a Marry Christmas and Happy New Year.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝，也祝妳聖誔節快樂，新年蒙褔。

sentences.english: Beyond Qingshuihe, the road turns into a mud fest.
sentences.chinese: 過了清水河之後，道路再一次成了亂泥節。

sentences.english: Paul had three specific requests in verses 31, 32.
sentences.chinese: 保羅在第31和32節提出三項明確的代禱要求。

sentences.english: It is found in Ephesians, Chapter 1, verse 11.
sentences.chinese: 是在以弗所書第一章，11節。

sentences.english: Jesus goes back to Heaven this event is called The Ascension.
sentences.chinese: 最後的宗教節日在耶穌升天節達到高潮。

definition: to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
